topic.title: Deleting cards
topic.p: To delete a card, simply navigate to the card you want to delete and click the "Delete" button in the grey toolbar at the top and bottom of the card.
You can also delete cards in bulk by selecting the cards you want to delete in list view and clicking the "Delete" button in the grey toolbar at the top of the list view.

bullets.item: Only project or Mingle admins can delete cards. Read more about user roles.
Cards cannot be deleted in edit mode.
